org.jetel.graph.runtime

Class CloverWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.CloverWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public abstract class CloverWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    This implementation of Runnable interface should be use for each thread inside a component.
    See Also:
    ContextProvider
